title: UIU APP Forum
description: Actively engaged in discussions, workshops, and tech meetups focused on app development, mobile UI/UX trends, and software innovation. Collaborated with peers to explore new technologies and enhance team-based problem-solving skills.

title: UIU Computer Club
description: Participated in coding contests, seminars, and project showcases that strengthened my technical foundation and teamwork. Took part in organizing events that promoted programming, software development, and digital creativity within the campus.
